```{r, context = "setup", include = FALSE}
# load libraries
library(shiny)
library(dplyr)
library(data.table)
library(DT)

# set options/configuration
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

```{r global, context="data", include = FALSE}
# load data
customers = fread("data/olist_customers_dataset.csv") %>% head(200)
geolocation = fread("data/olist_geolocation_dataset.csv") %>% head(200)
order_items = fread("data/olist_order_items_dataset.csv") %>% head(200)
payments = fread("data/olist_order_payments_dataset.csv") %>% head(200)
order_reviews = fread("data/olist_order_reviews_dataset.csv") %>% head(200)
order = fread("data/olist_orders_dataset.csv") %>% head(200)
products = fread("data/olist_products_dataset.csv") %>% head(200)
sellers = fread("data/olist_sellers_dataset.csv") %>% head(200)
cnt = fread("data/product_category_name_translation.csv") %>% head(200)
```

資料檢視 {data-icon="fa-sitemap" .storyboard}
=====================================================================

### Customers Dataset <br> This dataset has information about the customer and its location. 

```{r}
renderDataTable({
  DT::datatable(customers, options = list(
    bPaginate = FALSE
  ))
})
```

### Geolocation Dataset <br> This dataset has information Brazilian zip codes and its lat/lng coordinates.

```{r}
renderDataTable({
  DT::datatable(geolocation, options = list(
    bPaginate = FALSE
  ))
})
```

### Order Items Dataset <br> This dataset includes data about the items purchased within each order.

```{r}
renderDataTable({
  DT::datatable(order_items, options = list(
    bPaginate = FALSE
  ))
})
```

### Payments Dataset <br> This dataset includes data about the orders payment options.

```{r}
renderDataTable({
  DT::datatable(payments, options = list(
    bPaginate = FALSE
  ))
})
```

### Order Reviews Dataset <br> This dataset includes data about the reviews made by the customers.

```{r}
renderDataTable({
  DT::datatable(order_reviews, options = list(
    bPaginate = FALSE
  ))
})
```

### Order Dataset <br> This is the core dataset. From each order you might find all other information.

```{r}
renderDataTable({
  DT::datatable(order, options = list(
    bPaginate = FALSE
  ))
})
```

### Products Dataset <br> This dataset includes data about the products sold by Olist.

```{r}
renderDataTable({
  DT::datatable(products, options = list(
    bPaginate = FALSE
  ))
})
```

### Sellers Dataset <br> This dataset includes data about the sellers that fulfilled orders made at Olist.

```{r}
renderDataTable({
  DT::datatable(sellers, options = list(
    bPaginate = FALSE
  ))
})
```

### Category Name Translation <br> Translates the product_category_name to english.

```{r}
renderDataTable({
  DT::datatable(cnt, options = list(
    bPaginate = FALSE
  ))
})
```
